item.description:
Cranberry Trifest

Sprint

Cranberry Trifest offers a terrific weekend of racing including a sprint distance triathlon, a kids duathlon and an olympic distance triathlon that was been selected as the USAT Northeast Regional Club Championship on multiple occassions. The sprint will be on Saturday, August 25, 2012 and the kids duathlon will follow the sprint with a 1km run-2km bike-1km run at 12:00PM. The olympic distance triathlon (0.8 mile swim/26.3 mile bike/6.2 mile run) will be on Sunday, August 26, 2012 starting at 8:00AM.


Cranberry Trifest promises you safe and scenic races and a festive atmosphere with a DJ, valuable giveaways, post-race refreshments after each race and a venue that lets you sit back with friends as the 2012 multisport season nears a close. We'll also crown the King and Queen of Cranberry (details on the "Event Details" page). If you've got kids its a great venue for bringing them... when the rest of the family isn't cheering on Mom or Dad, they can enjoy the playground, toss a ball or frisbee around on the baseball fields, or practice their "ollie" at the skateboard park. Or they can do the kids duathlon!
item.name: Cranberry Trifest (Olympic)
